mapper.update: update alg_cash_his set usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_src = #{cashSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_amount = #{cashAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_time = #{cashTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where tra_sn = #{traSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tra_sn, usr_sn, cash_src, cash_amount, currency, status, cust_no, cash_time, create_time from alg_cash_his where tra_sn = #{traSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select tra_sn, usr_sn, cash_src, cash_amount, currency, status, cust_no, cash_time, create_time from alg_cash_his
